entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -17.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Flin Flon Airport 2:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
